question.string: Who plays Phileas Fogg in the adaptation of Around the World in 80 Days directed by Buzz Kulik?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x rdfs:label ?l . FILTER regex(?l,"Around the World in 80 Days","i") ?x dbo:director res:Buzz_Kulik . ?x dbo:starring ?uri . ?uri text:"plays" text:"Phileas Fogg" . }

question.string: At which college did the only American actor that received the César Award study?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?string WHERE { ?x text:"is" text:"the only American actor that received the César Award" . ?x dbo:almaMater ?uri . }

question.string: Where did the first man in space die?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"is" text:"first man in space" . ?x dbo:deathPlace ?uri . }

question.string: Which Chinese-speaking country is a former Portguese colony?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Chinese_language dbo:spokenIn ?uri . ?uri text:"is" text:"former Portuguese colony" . }

question.string: What is the largest city in the county in which Faulkner spent most of his life?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:William_Faulkner text:"spent most of his life in" ?x . ?x dbo:largestCity ?uri . }

question.string: Which movie by the Coen brothers stars John Turturro in the role of a New York City playwright?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf:type: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Film . ?uri dbo:director res:Coen_brothers . ?uri dbo:starring res:John_Turturro . res:John_Turturro text:"role" text:"New York City playwright" . }

question.string: Dakar is the capital of which country member of the African Union?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"member of" text:"the African Union" . ?uri dbo:capital res:Dakar . }

question.string: Which city does the first person to climb all 14 eight-thousanders come from?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"is" text:"first person to climb all fourteen eight-thousanders" . ?x dbo:birthPlace ?uri . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Settlement . }

question.string: Under which king did the British prime minister that signed the Munich agreement serve?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:PrimeMinistersOfTheUnitedKingdom . ?x text:"sign" text:"Munich Agreement" . ?x dbo:monarch ?uri . }

question.string: Who succeeded the pope that reigned only 33 days?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x rdf:type yago:Popes . ?x text:"reign" text:"33 days" . ?x dbo:successor ?uri . }

question.string: A landmark of which city is the home of the Mona Lisa?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Mona_Lisa dbo:museum ?x . ?x text:"landmark in" ?uri . }

question.string: Which street basketball player was diagnosed with Sarcoidosis?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:StreetBasketballPlayers . ?uri text:"diagnosed with" text:"Sarcoidosis". }

question.string: When was the composer of the opera Madame Butterfly born?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { res:Madama_Butterfly text:"composer" ?x . ?x dbo:birthDate ?date . }

question.string: Which anti-apartheid activist graduated from the University of South Africa?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type text:"anti-apartheid activist" . ?uri dbo:almaMater res:University_of_South_Africa . }

question.string: Who is the front man of the band that wrote Coffee & TV?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/page/Coffee_&_TV> dbo:musicalArtist ?x . ?x dbo:bandMember ?uri . ?uri text:"is" text:"frontman" . }

question.string: Which recipients of the Victoria Cross died in the Battle of Arnhem?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dbo:award res:Victoria_Cross . ?uri text:"died in" text:"Battle of Arnhem" . }

question.string: Gaborone is the capital of which country member of the African Union?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"member of" text:"African Union" . ?uri dbo:capital res:Gaborone . }

question.string: Which German mathematicians were members of the von Braun rocket group?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri ?abstract WHERE { ?uri dbo:field res:Mathematics . ?uri dbo:birthPlace res:Germany . ?uri text:"member of" text:"von Braun rocket group" . }

question.string: Are there man-made lakes in Australia that are deeper than 100 meters?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf:type: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> PREFIX rdf:type: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> ASK WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Lake . ?uri dbo:country res:Australia . ?uri text:"is" text:"man-made" . ?uri dbo:depth ?num . FILTER(?num > 100.0) }

question.string: Which Secretary of State policies lead to the United States' acquisition of Pacific colonies?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/office> "United States Secretary of State" . ?uri text:"policies lead" text:"United States' acquisition of Pacific colonies" . }

question.string: Which Secretary of State was significantly involved in the United States' dominance of the Caribbean?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dbo:office "United States Secretary of State" . ?uri text:"significiantly involved in" text:"United States' dominance of the Caribbean" . }

question.string: Who played the drums in the band that wrote Complete Control?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Complete_Control dbo:musicalArtist ?x . ?x dbo:bandMember ?uri . ?uri text:"plays" text:"drums" . }

question.string: Which horses did The Long Fellow ride?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"known as" text:"The Long Fellow" . ?x dbo:raceHorse ?uri . }

question.string: How many awards achieved the creator of the world's most famous equation?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT COUNT(?proj) WHERE { ?uri text:"the world's most famous equation" . ?uri dbo:awards ?proj . }

question.string: Of the people that died of radiation in Los Alamos, whose death was an accident?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?rui dbo:deathPlace <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Los_Alamos,_New_Mexico> . ?uri dbo:deathCause res:Acute_radiation_syndrome . ?uri text:"death circumstance" text:"accident" . }

question.string: Which writers converted to Islam?

question.string: Under which pseudonym did Charles Dickens publish some of his books?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?s WHERE { ?x dbo:author res:Charles_Dickens . ?x text:"published under pseudonyn" ?s . }

question.string: For which movie did the daughter of Francis Ford Coppola receive an Oscar?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Francis_Ford_Coppola dbo:child ?x . ?x text:"receive Oscar for" ?uri . }

question.string: Who is the president by whom 20 million Americans had gained health insurance?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri text:"20 million Americans had gained health insurance" . ?uri dbp:signedPresident ?proj . }

question.string: Who invented the World Wide Web?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:"world wide web" . ?proj rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/Inventor110214637> . }

question.string: Which astronauts died at the Columbia disaster also known as STS-107?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { { ?uri text:"Columbia disaster" . } UNION { ?uri text:"STS-107" } ?proj rdf:type dbo:Astronaut . ?proj dbo:deathDate ?date. FILTER (bound (?date))}

question.string: In which city was the assassin of Martin Luther King born?

question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?name WHERE { res:Croissant dbo:creator ?x . ?x text:"founder of" ?name . }

question.string: List all the battles commanded by the lover of Cleopatra.

question.string: On which island did the national poet of Greece die?

question.string: Which books of the laureate of American lowlife are published by Black Sparrow Books?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri text:"laureate of American lowlife" . ?proj dbo:author ?uri . ?proj dbo:publisher dbr:Black_Sparrow_Books . }

question.string: How many floors does the world's only 7 star hotel have?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri text:"world's only 7 star hotel" . ?uri dbo:floorCount ?proj . }

question.string: How many children does the actor who plays Dan White in Milk have?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT ?n WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Milk_(film)> <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/starring> ?uri . ?uri text:"play" text:"Dan White" . ?uri <http://dbpedia.org/property/children> ?n . }

question.string: Who are the architects of the tallest building in Japan?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { text:"tallest building in Japan" <http:/dbpedia.org/ontology/architect> ?uri . }

question.string: Which recipients of the Victoria Cross fought in the Battle of Arnhem?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri dbo:award res:Victoria_Cross . { ?uri text:"fought in" text:"Battle of Arnhem" . } UNION {?uri text:"went into action" text:"Battle of Arnhem"} }

question.string: Which buildings in art deco style did Shreve, Lamb and Harmon design?
Which country did the first known photographer of snowflakes come from?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri text:"is" text:"first known photographer of snowflakes" . ?uri dbo:birthPlace ?x . ?x rdf:type dbo:Country . }

question.string: What is the Answer to The Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri text:"Answer to The Ultimate Question of Life, the Universe, and Everything" . }

question.string: Which building owned by the Bank of America was featured in the TV series MegaStructures?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Building. ?uri dbo:owner res:Bank_of_America . ?uri text:"featured in" text:"MegaStructures" . }

question.string: How old is James Bond in the latest Bond book by William Boyd?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:James_Bond dbo:lastAppearance ?x . ?x dbo:author <http://dbpedia.org/resource/William_Boyd_(writer)> . ?x text:"age of Bond" ?n . }

question.string: Which of the volcanoes that erupted in 1550 was named after an explorer?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> <http:/dbpedia.org/ontology/Volcano> . ?uri <http:/dbpedia.org/ontology/eruptionYear> ?y . ?uri text:"named after" text:"explorer" . FILTER (year(?y) = 1550) }

question.string: In which British territories was the "Father of Singapore" born?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { text:"Father of modern Singapore" <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/birthPlace> ?uri . ?uri rdf:type text:"British territories" . }

question.string: When was the composer of the opera Madama Butterfly born?

question.string: How many Golden Globe awards did the husband of Katie Holmes win?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ?awards) WHERE { res:Katie_Holmes dbp:spouse ?uri . ?uri text:"win" ?award . ?award rdf:type text:"Golden Globe" . }

question.string: Are the Rosetta Stone and the Gayer-Andersen cat exhibited in the same museum?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { ?m1 text:"exhibits" res:Rosetta_Stone . res:Gayer-Anderson_Cat dbo:museum ?x . ?m2 rdfs:label ?m2 . FILTER (?m1=?m2) }

question.string: In which city was the mother of Bill Gates born?

question.string: Under which king did the British prime minister that had a reputation as a playboy serve?

question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?date WHERE { <http:/dbpedia.org/resource/Madama_Butterfly> text:"called" text:"the greatest composer of Italian opera after Verdi" . ?x <http:/dbpedia.org/ontology/birthDate> ?date . }

question.string: Who composed the music for the film that depicts the early life of Jane Austen?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x rdf:type dbo:Film . ?x text:"depicts the early life of" text:"Jane Austen" . ?x dbo:musicComposer ?uri . }

question.string: Which writers had influenced the philosopher that refused a Nobel Prize?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x rdf:type dbo:Philosopher . ?x text:"refuse" text:"Nobel Prize" . ?x dbo:influencedBy ?uri . ?uri rdf:type dbo:Writer . }

question.string: Who composed the music for the film that depicts the early life of Jane Austin?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x rdf:type dbo:Film . ?x text:"depicts the early life of" text:"Jane Austin" . ?x dbo:musicComposer ?uri . }

question.string: Under which pseudonym did Charles Dickens write some of his books?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?string WHERE { ?x <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/author> <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Charles_Dickens> . ?x text:"writing under the pseudonym of" ?string . }

question.string: Which princess died in a car crash in Paris?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:"car crash" . ?proj rdf:type dbo:Royalty . ?proj dbo:deathPlace dbr:Paris }

question.string: Which birds are protected under the National Parks and Wildlife Act?
question.pseudoquery:
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf:type: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Bird . ?uri text:"protected under" text:"National Parks and Wildlife Act".
}

question.string: List all the battles fought by the lover of Cleopatra.
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"lover" text:"Cleopatra". ?x dbo:battle ?uri . }

question.string: Who is the founder of the Turkish Republic?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:"founder" . ?proj rdf:type <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/PresidentsOfTurkey> . }

question.string: Which buildings owned by the crown overlook the North Sea?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Building. ?uri dbo:owner res:The_Crown . ?uri text:"overlook" text:"North Sea" . }

question.string: Which of the volcanoes that erupted in 1550 is still active?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> PREFIX rdf:type: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#type> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type dbo:Volcano . ?uri dbo:eruptionYear ?y . FILTER (year(?y) = 1550) ?uri text:"is" text:"active" . }

question.string: Where was the "Father of Singapore" born?
Who was the president of the USSR during the cold war?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:"cold war" . ?proj rdf:type dbo:Person . ?proj dbp:title dbr:President_of_the_Soviet_Union . }

question.string: What is the birth place of Hollywood's highest-paid actress?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"is" text:"Hollywood's highest-paid actress" . ?x dbo:birthPlace ?uri . }

question.string: Where was the first race for the greatest Formula One driver of all times?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri text:"greatest Formula One driver of all times" . ?uri dbo:firstRace ?proj . }

question.string: Who is the wife of the creator of the César Award?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { <http://dbpedia.org/resource/César_Award> text:"created by" <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Georges_Cravenne> . <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Georges_Cravenne> <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/spouse> ?uri . }

question.string: Who were generals of the battle of gettysburg?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:"general" . ?proj rdf:type dbo:Person . ?proj dbo:battle dbr:Battle_of_Gettysburg . }

question.string: In which city where Charlie Chaplin's half brothers born?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> ASK WHERE { res:Charlie_Chaplin dbo:relative ?x . ?x text:"half brother of" ?res:Charlie_Chaplin . ?x dbo:birthPlace ?y . ?y text:"is a" text:"city" . }

question.string: Who was the mayor of London during the olympic games?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:"Olympic Games" . ?proj rdf:type dbo:Person . ?proj dbp:office dbr:Mayor_of_London . }

question.string: Who is the architect of the tallest building in Japan?
In which city does the sports commentator know as Memory Man live?
question.pseudoquery: SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"is" text:"sports commentator" . ?x text:"known as" text:"Memory Man" . ?x <http:/dbpedia.org/ontology/residence> ?uri .

question.string: When was the European President known as the decider born?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?uri text:"the decider" . ?uri dbo:birthDate ?proj. ?uri rdf:type http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/PresidentsOfTheEuropeanCouncil . }

question.string: How old was Steve Jobs' sister when she first met him?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT ?n WHERE { res:Steve_Jobs dbo:relative ?uri . ?uri text:"first met him when she was" ?n . }

question.string: Who was vice president under the president who approved the use of atomic weapons against Japan during World War II?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"approved the use of" text:"atomic weapons against Japan" . ?x dbo:vicePresident ?uri . }

question.string: What eating disorder is characterized by eating substances such as clay and sand?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX yago: <http://dbpedia.org/class/yago/> SELECT ?uri WHERE { ?uri rdf:type yago:EatingDisorders . ?uri text:"characterized by" "appetite for clay and sand" . }

question.string: Who first deciphered the Egyptian hieroglyphs?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX rdf: <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?proj WHERE { ?proj text:"first deciphered" . ?proj rdf:type dbo:Person . ?mother dbp:field dbr:Egyptian_hieroglyphs . }

question.string: In which city does the former main presenter of the Xposé girls live?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { ?x text:"is" text:"former presenter of the Xposé girls" . ?x dbo:residence ?uri .

question.string: In which town was the assassin of Martin Luther King born?
question.pseudoquery: PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/> PREFIX dbp: <http://dbpedia.org/property/> PREFIX res: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/> SELECT DISTINCT ?uri WHERE { res:Martin_Luther_King,_Jr. text:"assassin" ?x . ?x dbo:birthPlace ?uri . ?uri dbp:districtType "Township"@en . }
